questions.question: .................................... people supported the project.
questions.description: We use some before a noun without a determiner.

questions.question: .................................  my friends are vegetarians.
questions.description: We use some of before a noun with a determiner.

questions.question: .................................... them came forward to help me.
questions.description: We use none of before a personal pronoun.

questions.question: I spoke to ................................ the eye witnesses.
questions.description: We use some of before a noun with a determiner.

questions.question: Take ................................... the shirts.
questions.description: We use any of before a noun with a determiner.

questions.question: ................................ the books in the library are missing.
questions.description: We use some of before a noun with a determiner.

questions.question: I spent ..................................... days with them last month.
questions.description: Write a few to refer to a small number.

questions.question: .................................... us enjoyed the party, but I was bored.
questions.description: We use some of before a personal pronoun.

questions.question: I have invited ...................................... my friends.
questions.description: All and all of can both be used before a noun with a determiner.
